list-item.p: Everyone has an obligation to participate
From brainstorming forward, build on others’ good ideas
Respond honestly – doesn’t help the group to withhold what you really think
Critique ideas; not individuals – make the team a psychologically “safe space”
Seek consensus … … and have a process for making decisions
Share leadership … … but define clear roles for specific tasks and stages
Minimize egos … … and maximize fun and humor’
